verbose_text: Upon ligand binding, the type II receptors activate the type I receptors, which activate and recruit Smad2 and Smad3 and activated Smad2 and Smad3 combined with Smad4 then translocate to the nucleus to regulate gene expression.
evidence: type I receptors, which activate and recruit Smad2 and Smad3 and activated Smad2 and Smad3 combined with Smad4 then translocate to the nucleus
